name: Honey, I'm home! (belzebunny)
description:
A game jam project about honey, flowers and bees! Build blocks to make your way through the levels, and follow the flowers to find your queen!

Credits:

Iina "Belzebunny "Andersson  (https://belzebunny.carrd.co/)

Niclas "Xantain" Valpola (https://linktr.ee/nvalpola)

Kasper Pimiä (https://www.linkedin.com/in/kasper-pimi%C3%A4-7a5a2b217/)

Linnea Lampinen 

Music by Vitun Luurangot (https://open.spotify.com/artist/42HCn1e1J3ytBaepgM3CJ7?si=YkasNQoTT8esPqVGw-BXZg)

Sound effects by Zapsplat
